img_above_text:
![Goat Skull .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f9/Goat_Skull_.jpg)| Goat Skull| Rare | Using the gourd moderately increases maximum health for a short duration. | Chance to be found when picking up Licorice plants | Goat Skull
![Thunderbolt Horn .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Thunderbolt_Horn_.jpg)| Thunderbolt Horn| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Shock resistance for a short duration | After completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, it is found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Thunderbolt Horn
img_below_text:
![Breath Of Fire .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0d/Breath_Of_Fire_.jpg)| Breath Of Fire| Epic | Using the gourd significantly increases attack for the next Unveiling Strike in Cloud Step for a short duration | Defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake - Turtle Island (secret boss) in The New West (requires Loong Scales) | Breath Of Fire
![Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1e/Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg)| Turtle Tear| Epic | When at full Health, using the gourd recovers a moderate amount of Mana | Found in North Shore of the Bitter Lake at Bitter Lake in The New West, along the right side of the shore Interact with the skeleton at the back of the area to spawn the Soak back on the shoreline | Turtle Tear

![Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1e/Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg)| Turtle Tear| Epic | When at full Health, using the gourd recovers a moderate amount of Mana | Found in North Shore of the Bitter Lake at Bitter Lake in The New West, along the right side of the shore Interact with the skeleton at the back of the area to spawn the Soak back on the shoreline | Turtle Tear"

img_summary: The image appears to be an artifact or relic, likely representing an item from the game "Black Myth: Wukong." Based on the context provided, it is positioned between descriptions of the "Thunderbolt Horn" and "Breath Of Fire" items.
